title: *.googlecode.com cert is not valid for *.go.googlecode.com
body:
by **barry.allard**: 
*.googlecode.com is not a superset of *.go.googlecode.com, only go.googlecode.com would
match.  

Use Case:

Jonny needs the raw contents of packages from one of non-primary repos.  Unfortunately,
the current go.googlecode.com setup does not conform to standard ssl behavior.

Example: https://crypto.go.googlecode.com/hg/scrypt/scrypt.go

Doesn't work on the following:

Chrome Stable 22.0.1229.79 (osx).
Chrome Canary 24.0.1286.0 (osx).
Firefox 15.0.1 (release, osx).
Safari 6.0.1 (7536.26.14) (release, osx).
gnu wget 1.14 (brew osx)
gnu wget 1.13.4 (ubuntu precise lts)
